channel.title: Another 360 song
channel.description: Sung to the tune of 'The Devil's got your number' from the play Blood Brothers by Willy Russel Microsoft's got your number- Sanga282(Ancient) 360 upon the table A HDMI Attached A RROD shinin' The discs been scratched You're walkin' on the pavement cracks You've bought a 360 and its come to pass Now y'know Microsoft's got your number Y' know Gates gonna find y' Y' know he's right behind y' He's eating your wallet He's wasting your time Ain't no point at clutching At your 360 You gotta get a PS3 Even when you shut your eyes you still see That horrible 360 it's worse than a nun But y' know the Microsoft's got your number Y' know Gate's gonna find y' Y' know he's right behind y' He's eating your wallet He's wasting your time Yes, y' know the Gate's got your number He's gonna find y' Y' know he's right behind y' He's standin' on your step Holding a 360 at your door He's knocking at your door He's knocking at your door

item.title: Another 360 song
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Sung to the tune of ‘The Devil’s got your number’ from the play Blood Brothers by Willy Russel
Microsoft’s got your number- Sanga282(Ancient)
360 upon the table
A HDMI Attached
A RROD shinin’
The discs been scratched
You’re walkin’ on the pavement cracks
You’ve bought a 360 and its come to pass
Now y’know Microsoft’s got your number
Y’ know Gates gonna find y’
Y’ know he’s right behind y’
He’s eating your wallet
He’s wasting your time
Ain’t no point at clutching
At your 360
You gotta get a PS3
Even when you shut your eyes you still see
That horrible 360
it’s worse than a nun
But y’ know the Microsoft’s got your number
Y’ know Gate’s gonna find y’
Y’ know he’s right behind y’
He’s eating your wallet
He’s wasting your time
Yes, y’ know the Gate’s got your number
He’s gonna find y’
Y’ know he’s right behind y’
He’s standin’ on your step
Holding a 360 at your door
He’s knocking at your door
He’s knocking at your door

Read full topic
